name: Ludum Dare 46 - Save Dave
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 45.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/save-dave

Theme: "Keep It Alive"

In a monstrous apocalypse, Dave has been with you always. You just need to survive until morning, using your virtual pet skills to keep Dave Alive. Also there are monsters bearing down on you, so shoot them too!

Controls:

  • Everything is click controlled, mouse only
  • Holding left click on enemies damages them with your ray gun
  • Holding left click on Dave drags him around the screen
  • Click on Dave's control buttons to bring up the menu and interact!

All art, music, and programming done by myself during the game jam.  Only outside piece was Kenney's font "Kenney Pixel" and "Kenney Thick". I supported them; you should too!  https://kenney.itch.io/

Made in Godot 3.2.1
